DOC.brief_summary: The purpose clinical trial evaluate safety effectiveness TECNIS Multifocal 1-Piece Intraocular Lens ( IOLs ) , Models ZKB00 ZLB00 provide statistically good distance-corrected near visual acuity compare monofocal control lens . Complication adverse event rate associate Multifocal IOL within ISO SPE rate posterior chamber IOLs .

DOC.criteria: Minimum 18 year age Bilateral cataracts phacoemulsification extraction posterior IOL implantation plan eye Preoperative bestcorrected distance visual acuity ( BCDVA ) 20/40 worse ( Snellen ) without glare source Potential postoperative bestcorrected visual acuity 20/25 well Preoperative corneal astigmatism 1.0 D less normal corneal topography irregular corneal astigmatism Clear intraocular medium , cataract Availability , willingness sufficient cognitive awareness comply examination procedure Signed informed consent HIPAA authorization equivalent documentation necessary comply applicable privacy law pertain medical treatment govern country Ability understand respond questionnaire verbally administer English Requiring intraocular lens power outside available range +16.0 +28.0 D Pupil abnormality ( nonreactive , fix pupil , abnormally shape pupil ) Recent ocular trauma ocular surgery resolved/stable may affect visual outcome Prior refractive ( LASIK , LASEK , RK
